tool_description:
Live air traffic and aircraft positional data via ADS-B / MLAT / UAT

NOTE: Please scroll down to view the Terms & Conditions for use and Legal Notice.
name: ADSBexchange.com
title: ADSBexchange.com

api_list.name: Aircraft Last Position by Hex ID (icao)
api_list.description: Returns one aircraft last known location using the mode-s hex (icao), if aircraft has flown in the last 48 hours.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://adsbexchange-com1.p.rapidapi.com/v2/hex/a4b605/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "adsbexchange-com1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://adsbexchange-com1.p.rapidapi.com/v2/hex/{icao}/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "adsbexchange-com1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Aircraft Live Position by Hex ID (icao)

api_list.name: Single Aircraft Position by Hex ID (icao)
api_list.description: Single aircraft Position by ICAO Mode S 6-digit transponder hex code (if currently tracked)

api_list.name: Aircraft within 250 NM Radius
api_list.description: Show all Aircraft within 250 Nautical Mile radius of a point

required_parameters.name: lon
required_parameters.description: Longitude (-180 to 180) Hint: US is negative longitude!

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://adsbexchange-com1.p.rapidapi.com/v2/lat/51.46888/lon/-0.45536/dist/250/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "adsbexchange-com1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://adsbexchange-com1.p.rapidapi.com/v2/lat/{lat}/lon/{lon}/dist/250/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "adsbexchange-com1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Aircraft by Squawk
api_list.description: Returns one or more aircraft currently broadcasting a specific squawk code

required_parameters.name: sqk
required_parameters.description: 4-digit Transponder Squawk Code in Octal (ie.1200, 7700, 1234 etc.)

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://adsbexchange-com1.p.rapidapi.com/v2/sqk/1200/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "adsbexchange-com1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://adsbexchange-com1.p.rapidapi.com/v2/sqk/{sqk}/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "adsbexchange-com1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
